sentence.Network_en: He had purchased a painting in reliance upon the authentication of a well-regarded expert.

sentence.Network_cn: 计算机网络安全技术主要有: 认证授权(Authentication) 、 数据加密(Encryption) 、 访问控制(AccessControl) 、 安全审计(Auditing)等.

encyclopedia.content: Authentication — 身份验证 在 .NET Framework 安全中，通过对照某些机构检查用户的凭据，发现和验证主体标识的过程。另请参见：主体。

entry.def: If you authenticate something, you state officially that it is genuine after examining it.

example.ex: He says he'll have no problem authenticating the stamp...
example.tran: 他说自己可以对这枚邮票进行鉴定。

example.ex: All the antiques have been authenticated and recorded.
example.tran: 所有的古董都已经过鉴别并进行记录。

entry.def: If you authenticate something, you prove or confirm that it is true.

example.ex: Documentaries offered the chance to authenticate the accuracy of the various details in these models...
example.tran: 纪录片为核实这些模型中各种细节的准确性提供了机会。

example.ex: There have now been well authenticated reports that the use of this drug is very occasionally responsible for heart attacks.
example.tran: 现在已有非常可靠的报告证明该药物偶可引发心脏病。

means.word_mean: 1. a mark on an article of trade to indicate its origin and authenticity
2. validating the authenticity of something or someone
